doc_text:
Ground has been broken on the new Highmark Center for Health, Wellness and Athletics!

To learn more about the project or explore event highlights, visit our new Highmark Center website . Here, you can track the progress of the building and read about all of the robust services, contemporary facilities and educational programs that this building will offer the CMU community. See live construction! Be sure to check back often to see new features.

For now, below are some renderings of what this magnificant space will encompass for not only varsity student-athletes and staff but the entire campus community.

View from outside Margaret Morrison View from turn down Margaret Morrison Street View from corner of Tech and Frew Streets Proposed indoor varsity sports arena with spectator seating Proposed indoor turf and track runway with batting cages on far end in renovated historic Skibo Gymnasium Proposed multi-purpose court for recreational use

Share

Facebook

Twitter

Email

Print

qa_list.question: What is the purpose of the new Highmark Center?
qa_list.answer: The purpose of the new Highmark Center for Health, Wellness and Athletics is to offer robust services, contemporary facilities, and educational programs to the CMU community.

qa_list.question: What kind of facilities will be available at the Highmark Center?
qa_list.answer: The Highmark Center for Health, Wellness and Athletics will offer a variety of facilities including an indoor varsity sports arena with spectator seating, an indoor turf and track runway with batting cages on the far end in renovated historic Skibo Gymnasium, and a multi-purpose court for recreational use.

qa_list.question: What is the location of Margaret Morrison?
qa_list.answer: Margaret Morrison is located at the corner of Tech and Frew Streets.
